instruction: I have been practicing professional writing lately. Now I am writing essay which requires one paragraph each for introduction, body and conclusion with single-space for introduction, double-space for body then one-and-a-half-space for conclusion. The font size of this essay is 12. Could you help me on this?

minimal: `CLICK` on the dropdown next to 'Line spacing' and select 'Single'
`MOVE_TO` the beginning of the body paragraph
`DRAG_TO` the end of the body paragraph
`CLICK` on the dropdown next to 'Line spacing' and select 'Double'
`MOVE_TO` the beginning of the conclusion paragraph
`DRAG_TO` the end of the conclusion paragraph
`CLICK` on the dropdown next to 'Line spacing' and select '1.5 lines'
